Pools with higher stakes are more often selected as slot leaders by the #Cardano protocol so they produce more blocks than smaller pools. Nevertheless, rewards are similarly the same in both cases. Do not hesitate to delegate $ADA coins to smaller pools. They can perform to 100%.  https://t.co/lko3Eg39Q6

Let's make one thing clear.  #Staking is related to #PoS and native coins like $ADA in the #Cardano ecosystem provide consensus power. You can keep your coins safe in your wallet.  When you send coins to a third party that promises you some profit then do not call it staking.  https://t.co/BPE4eJAXSN
